column3: Traffic;(Phnom Penh): A man driving a truck at high speeds lost control
column4: hitting property causing damage. Nobody was injured.------The incident occurred in the early hours of March 1
column6: along Veng Sreng Road near Independence Market 3
column9: Phnom Penh.------Witnesses said the truck was driving west along the Veng Sreng Road when it suddenly veered right and hit the houses
column10: ------The truck driver jumped out the cab and ran off into the night
column11: leaving the damaged truck for the authorities to deal with.------After the incident
column12: the truck was taken to the Phnom Penh Road Traffic Police office to wait for a legal settlement later.
